text:
Stephen Michael Hahn (born January 22, 1960) is an American physician. He was the Commissioner of Food and Drugs since December 17, 2019. Before becoming Commissioner, he was a radiation oncologist who was the chief medical executive of the MD Anderson Cancer Center.
On March 1, 2020, Vice President Mike Pence and Health and Human Services Secretary Alex Azar announced the addition of Hahn to the White House Coronavirus Taskforce.
